example[1]: Jo stepped forward, her eyes blazing with fury.
example[2]: The report was leaked to the press, much to the president’s fury.
example[3]: ‘Go on then!’ shouted Jamie in a fury. ‘See if I care!’
definition[2]: used to describe very bad weather conditions
example[4]: At last the fury of the storm lessened.
definition[3]: one of the three snake-haired goddesses in ancient Greek stories who punished crime
